application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1/T2  -  2 x Cypress Trees that are growing up into adjacent trees, to reduce tops by up to 3m only - The remaining crown size of these trees once the works are completed, will be approximately 6m height and canopy spread of approx 1.5m.T3 - Sweet Chestnut to reduce crown back to precious reduction points, up to 2m. To allow light into garden/property - The remaining crown size of this tree once the works are completed, will be approximately 9m height and canopy spread of approx 4.5m.T4 - Holm Oak - Multi stemmed. To Pollard to a new height of approx 3m from ground level. Retain any furnishing growth where possible. This is to retain screening and allow re-growth. Reason for works, severe decay found at base and tree could fail onto building - This Tree will be Pollard by approx 6m to leave a new height of approx 3m, crown spread remaining 1-1.5mG1 - Group of Cypress/Hedge. To reduce height by approx 7m to previous reduction height, this will leave approx 7m from ground level. Trees/Hedge have become too tall fo space and block out light to both properties - to leave a new height of approx 7m, crown spread remaining, approx 2m
